#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
 const int size=10;
 int a[375]={0};
	int b,c=1,carry=0,d,t;
	long r;
	double p=0.0;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	//cout<<"enter a number to perform its factorial : ";
	cin>>b;
	for(int yt=2;yt<=b;yt++)
		p+=log10(yt);
d=(long)p+1;
//cout<<"it will take "<<d<<" location in the memory\n";
for(int op=0;op<d;op++){a[op]=0;}
	if(b>=0){
	a[0]=1;
	for(int i=1;i<=b;i++){
		for(int v=0;v<d;v++){
r=i*a[v]+carry;
		a[v]=r;
		carry=a[v]/10;
		a[v]=r%10;
		}
	}
	//cout<<"\nThe factorial of "<<b<<" is :\n";
	for(int w=d-1;w>=0;w--)
	cout<<a[w];
	}
	cout<<endl;
	c=1;
	carry=0;
	p=0.0;
}
     //	getch();
	return 0;
}
